name: Stone Paper Scissor
desc: Stone Paper Scissor is general game played by public ,I have made the same with the help to React ,here one side is user and other is machine

name: Discord Clone
desc: Discord clone made with the help of React,Firebase and Hooks.Login and Authentication is done using Firebase .Rest all funcnalities are build using React

name: Platzi :Shooping App
desc: Platzi is a shoping web application built using React,Firebase and Redux .State management is done using Redux .I have also enabled google Oauth login for more effective login

name: Hotel Management System
desc: HMS was built using microservices architecture where backend is built on Spring Boot,Spring Security and other technologies used are Eureka React
